trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section used by classes in the <see cref="N:System.Drawing" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="N:System.Drawing" /> 命名空間的類別中使用的組態區段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Configuration.SystemDrawingSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Configuration.SystemDrawingSection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the suffix to append to a file name indicated by a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute" /> when an assembly is declared with a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSameAssemblyAttribute" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSatelliteAssemblyAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當組件以 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSameAssemblyAttribute" /> 宣告時，要附加到 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSatelliteAssemblyAttribute" /> 所指示的檔案名稱的後置字元。

trans-unit.source: The bitmap suffix is appended to the file name before the extension.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖尾碼會附加至延伸模組之前的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, with a bitmap suffix of ".test.1.0", a <xref:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute> reference to "my.bmp" is interpreted as "my.test.1.0.bmp".
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖的尾碼，例如，使用 「。 test.1.0"、<xref:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute>參考 」 my.bmp"會解譯為"my.test.1.0.bmp"。
